Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw scored 109 runs, setting up a big first-innings total for South Africa
Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 10 runs, helping South Africa roll Bangladesh over for less than half of what they had scored
Post-Match Reflections: Rilee Rossouw was named the Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa won by 104 runs, which helped them temporarily top the table
Others: The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground, and the umpires were Langton Rusere and Rod Tucker
